body: Bah, funny how the artists older works have better art than this lmao. Enjoy your rape readers fans Riku-sensei!! Atleast now you don't have to think about what to make you dumb cuck.
The ntr is low on this one. Because we see it in the villain pov
Not interested in translating this. Not the sequel to the lending gf story I was hoping for and way too little focus on black hair girl. What a shame.
Arigathanks @bassgs. Looks like I wasn't too far off. Whew and given the author wrote the lending gf to friend, this won't end well.

@Eat68 Might have an error or two.

FMC (Yukino I believe) wants to bang her bf, he says it's too soon for them to bang.
She calls her friend (blonde girl, Natsuki I believe) seeking help.
Natsuki has a self proclaimed bf (he doesn't seem to consider her his gf) that she half forces to help with Yukino's problem.
Looks like Yukino has been having intimacy problems with her bf, has lost confidence and thinks there's something wrong with herself.
Natsuki suggests giving her some more practical experience.
Pages 12 to 31 happen.
She kinda gets into it and asks Natsuki's "bf" for more "practice" in the shower.
More stuff happens.
After, they confirm she's not the problem and Yukino's "bf" seems to know what's the problem here and says that he'll take care of the issue.
Bfs talk and Yukino's bf spills his worries and gets some tips from his older pal.
Everything seems fine at the end and everyone is happy, but it looks like Yukino will have more "practice sessions" with Natsuki's "bf".
Wonder what exactly is going on. Looks like she can't get into the mood? And goes with blonde JK friend for sex lessons? Kinda hard to tell?
winner but why does this guy look like a salary man? thought he was a classmate...
